page.title: 14GAMES CHILDREN PLAY.
page.content: I play hopscotch.Ten squares are drawn on the ground.You throw a stone to number 1,jump over this number and on upto 10,then return.When you reach number two again you pick up the stone and jump over number 1.You carry on doing this up to 10 unless you miss the square or tread on a line. By Alison,aged 9. We play Red Devil.One person turns round while others have to try and move without being seen.The person on turns round every 5 seconds.If you are seen you line up.The others try to tig you without being seen,and shout red devil.Any free player then tigged is on. By Richard,aged 11.
